```{css}
.publication-entry {
  margin-bottom: 1.2rem;
  padding: 0.8rem;
  border-left: 3px solid #2563eb;
  background: #f8fafc;
  border-radius: 0.25rem;
}

.pub-citation {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  line-height: 1.4;
  margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
}

.pub-title {
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #1f2937;
}

.pub-authors {
  color: #4b5563;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.pub-journal {
  font-style: italic;
  color: #4b5563;
}

.pub-doi {
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  margin-top: 0.3rem;
}

.pub-doi a {
  color: #2563eb;
  text-decoration: none;
}

.pub-doi a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

.section-header {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #374151;
  margin: 2rem 0 1rem 0;
  border-bottom: 2px solid #e5e7eb;
  padding-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .publication-entry {
    padding: 0.6rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }
  
  .pub-citation {
    font-size: 0.8rem;
  }
}
```
